description: This course prepares pre-service communication arts/literature teachers to share their
love of the English language with secondary students. Attention is given to the theory
and techniques of teaching writing, literature, reading, speech, listening, and media literacy. In
addition, students explore topics including multicultural literature,
adolescent literature, responding to and evaluating writing, unit planning in the
language arts, and the Common Core State Standards for Literacy.  Required field
experience component. Offered annually in the spring semester. Also counts toward linguistic
